attributes.action: please help avoid further bloodshed and suffering in Tibet by exercsing the authority of his office and influence with the IOC and Organizers of the Beijing Games to remove from the Beijing Olympic Torch Relay Route the Tibetan Autonomous Region and culturally Tibetan provinces of Qinhai, Sichuan, Yunnan, and Gansa immediatedly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow the Torch to cross the Tibetan Territories will undoubtedly escalate tensions. Under the present circumstances the notion that the Beijing 2008 Torch is the symbol and bringer of Peace and Tolerance will most certainly inflame Tibetan  feelings and provoke further protests, and in turn cause more arrest and possible deaths. To avoid these likely and potentialy tragic events by excluding the Tibetan Territories from the Route would be but a small price to pay.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
